<p>The manimlib/utils submodule serves as a collection of utility functions that support various aspects of the Manim library, including debugging, data structure manipulation, directory management, family operations on mobjects, mathematical computations, and LaTeX handling. Its overall responsibility is to provide reusable, helper functionalities that facilitate the development, debugging, and rendering processes within Manim, thereby enhancing modularity and code maintainability across the library.</p>
